flagsdescription.title: 456.hmmer Flags
flagsdescription.header: These are flags that appear in the benchmark sources, categorized as to whether they are portability candidates, mandatory, or forbidden.
flagsdescription.flag: Count gaps in sequences as a symbol and not a space.
The benchmark uses ALTIVEC-specific code.
Adds a main function for SQIO testing.
Indicates that the config.h has already been included.
Adds a main function for sre_strcat timing.
Enables debugging features.
Defines the directory path seperator character. Not needed for SPEC CPU2006 because no paths are specified in the test pararmeters.
Used to determine how much debug information to provide.
Value to print on a Failure exit.
Value to print on a Success exit.
Used as a boolean value, set to 0 if not already set.
Indicates that the funcs.h has already been included.
Provides testing of getopt functions.
Indicates that the gsi.h has already been included.
Indicates that 64 bit files offsets need to be used. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if fseek function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if fseek function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if ftell function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if ftell function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if htonl function is present for doing byte swaps. Used only to set USE_HOST_BYTESWAP_FUNCTIONS.
Indicates if htons function is present for doing byte swaps. Used only to set USE_HOST_BYTESWAP_FUNCTIONS.
Indicates if ntohl function is present for doing byte swaps. Used only to set USE_HOST_BYTESWAP_FUNCTIONS.
Indicates if ntohs function is present for doing byte swaps. Used only to set USE_HOST_BYTESWAP_FUNCTIONS.
Set pthreaded (not allowed) options.
Set pthreaded (not allowed) options.
Indicates if stat64 function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if strtoul function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Indicates if strtoull function is present. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Compiles the application as a parallel virtual machine.
Compiles the application as a pthreads - multi-threaded application.
Sets up the max() function. if not defined.
If set, uses a new function NewTraceScoreCorrection().
Sets up the min() function. if not defined.
Enables a main() for testing.
Enables a main() for a test driver.
sets : extern char *strstr(char *s, char *subs);
Used to print timings when running with >0 threads.

RAMLIMIT determines the point at which we switch from fast,full dynamic programming to slow, linear-memory divide and conquer dynamic programming algorithms. It is the minimum amount of available RAM on the systems the package will run on.
Enables a main() for a test driver.
If not already defined by other includes, include unistd.h to get definition.
Used in determining how to set HAS_64BIT_FILE_OFFSETS. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
The number bytes in a long. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
The number bytes in a long. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
The number bytes in a long. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
The number bytes in a long. Not used for SPEC CPU2006.
Causes the code to execute using a different algorithm.

Indicates that the sqrk.h has already been included.

Indicates that the squid.h has already been included.

Indicates that the squid_msa.h has already been included.
SRE_REMOVED removes the compilation of the EmitBestSequence routine
Set by SPEC_CPU to use ANSI code.
Indicates that the ssi.h has already been included.
Indicates that the stopwatch.h has already been included.
Indicates that the structs.h has already been included.

Indicates the sys/types.h and netinet/in.h are to be included to define ntoh[ls] and hton[ls].
WORDS_BIGENDIAN set to 1 by default, indicates that the words are big endian style.
Helps choose IRIX-friendly code for pthreads. Not used in SPEC CPU2006.
